goal.ch: 人工智慧 (AI) 是電腦科學的一個領域，涉及創建智慧代理，智慧代理是可以自主推理、學習和行動的系統。人工智慧旨在模仿人類智慧和解決問題的能力，使機器能夠執行通常需要人類智慧的任務。 近年來人工智慧(AI)在自然語言理解、電臘視覺影像、天氣預測等各種面向的辨識與生成上，已有相當的成效，許多產品並逐漸為大眾所接受，不論是在視覺、聽覺或是語言、資料分析上均獲得不少進展。這股人工智慧的潮流，顯示了未來產品智慧化的趨勢。在這門課中，我們將介紹人工智慧演進的歷程，以及主要技術的發展，包括搜尋、規劃、推論、機器學習等，以及相關技術在資料、文字、影像、語音等不同類型資料上，進行包括分類、偵測、辨識、標記、生成等不同問題的技術。
goal.en: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a field of computer science that deals with creating intelligent agents, which are systems that can reason, learn, and act autonomously. AI aims to mimic human intelligence and problem-solving abilities, allowing machines to perform tasks that would typically require human intelligence. AI is being used in a wide range of industries and applications, including medical diagnosis, finance, customer Service, manufacturing, transportation, entertainment, etc.

outline.ch:
第 1 週 (09/12)：人工智慧課程簡介
-什麼是智慧型代理人？
第 2 週 (09/19)：機器學習：分類+迴歸
-人類和機器如何學習？
-機器如何透過嵌入大量特徵來學習？
第 3 週 (09/26)：人工神經網絡
-機器如何透過提取隱藏特徵來學習？
第 4 週 (10/03)：LSTM 和 Transformer 及AutoEncoder
-機器如何做連續決策？
第 5 週 (10/10)：假期
第 6 週 (10/17)：強化學習 I
-我們如何做出順序決策？
第 7 週 (10/24)：TA設計思考 如何設計產品？
第 8 週 (10/31)：強化學習 II
第 9 週 (11/7)：語言模型+編碼器+解碼器
-機器如何產生回答？
第 10 週 (11/14)：LLM + RLHF (chatGPT)
-機器如何學習回應我們的請求？
第 11 週 (11/21)：期中考
第 12 週 (11/28）：對話代理[提案（書面）]
-如何建構對話系統？
第 13 週 (12/05)：專案提案 + 相關工作調查
-小組展示
第 14 週 (12/12)：下一代人機互動的對話代理
-機器如何為我們完成任務？
-教育對話代理
第 15 週 (12/19)：軟體開發多智能體合作的會話智能體
-MetaGPT、DevChat、XAgent
第 16 週 (12/26)：最終專案報告
outline.en:
1. 09/12 Week 1 Introduction to AI Course
AI - A Modern Approach: four editions 1995, 2010, 2016, 2021
How do machine learning shape the world
2. 09/19 Week 2 Machine Learning: Classification+Regression
When do we need classification and regression?
How do humans and machines learn?
How can machines learn by embedding numerous features?
3. 09/26 Week 3: Artificial Neural Networks
How can machines learn by distilling hidden features?
From perceptrons to neural networks
Convolutional neural networks
4. 10/03 Week 4: LSTM ＆ Transformer ＆ AutoEncoder
How do machines make sequential decisions?
Encoder-Decoder
5. 10/10 (Holiday)
6. 10/17 Week 6: Reinforcement Learning
How do we make sequential decisions?
Markov Decision Process
Model-free Prediction and Control
7. 10/24 Week 7: TA Design Thinking
How to design a product?
Possible Topics:
數位樂齡美好生活組
AI in Education
AI工具運用組
8. 10/31 Week 8: Reinforcement Learning
9. 11/7 Week 9: Language Model
How do machines generate sentences?
- BERT, GPT
- Pre-training, Fine-Tuning
Applications: Machine Translation, Question Generation
10. 11/14 Week 10: LLM + RLHF (chatGPT)
How do machines learn to respond to our requests?
Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF)
Dialog Systems
Training corpus generation
11. 11/21 Weel 11: Mid-term
12. 11/28 Week 12: Conversational Agents [Proposal (書面)]
How to construct a Dialog System?
Chatbots
Tasked Oriented Dialog Systems
How to prepare dialog training corpus
Schema-guided dialog generation
13. 12/05 Week 13: Project Proposal + Related Work Survey
Group presentation
14. 12/12 Week 14: Conversation Agents for Next Generation Human-Computer Interaction
From LLM to LAM: How do machines complete tasks for us?
Gorrila、CogAgent、RestAPI
Conversation Agents for Education
15. 12/19 Week 15: Conversational Agents for Software Development
MetaGPT、DevChat、XAgent
16. 12/26 Week 16: Final Project Report
